document_data.name: ''Giantbane''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Giantbane''''' was the favored [[weapon]] of [[Clangeddin Silverbeard]], the [[dwarf|dwarven]] [[deity]] of war and honor in battle.<ref name=frcs-3e-p238"><ref group="note">In ''[[Demihuman Deities]]'', Clangeddin's avatar wields two battleaxes, but these are unnamed. However, taking into account that fact that avatars of deities almost always carry their favored weapons and that the title of Clangeddin is the "Lord of the Twin Axes", they are assumed to be the same.
document_data.Powers: The [[avatar]] of Clangedin wielded two of these ''+4 [[battleaxe]]s'' that were made of [[mithril]], and could be thrown up to {{SI|100|yd}}. As well as having a higher chance to hit the target and hurting them more than usual, the [[axe]]s would [[magical]]ly return to the avatar's hands.
